titleStmt.title: The compleat courtier: Or, Cupid's Academy. Containing an exact and excellent collection of all the newest and choicest songs, poems, epigrams ... humbly recommended for the perusalof all young gentleman, ladies, and others, who are inclinable to recreate themselves with harmless mirth. / By J. Shurly, gent.
titleStmt.author: J. S. (John Shirley), fl. 1680-1702.
